mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsrmr`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_role_menu_relation as `tbsrmr`
GROUP BY
`tbsrmr`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRoleMenuRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsrmr`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_role_menu_relation as `tbsrmr`
GROUP BY
`tbsrmr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRoleMenuRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsrmr`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_role_menu_relation as `tbsrmr`
GROUP BY
`tbsrmr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRoleMenuRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsrmr`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_role_menu_relation as `tbsrmr`
GROUP BY
`tbsrmr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRoleMenuRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbsrmr`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_role_menu_relation as `tbsrmr`
GROUP BY
`tbsrmr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRoleMenuRelationPo.havingClause}
